#include<stdio.h>
typedef long long ll;
ll ncr(ll n, ll k)
{
    ll res = 1;
    if ( k > n - k )
        k = n - k;
	int i;
    for (i = 0; i < k; ++i)
    {
        res *= (n - i);
        res /= (i + 1);
    }
    return res;
}
int main()
{
	ll t,n,r;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&r);
		ll ans=ncr(n,r);
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
